name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Omaru Poruka Birthday Concert2024!! POL ROCK FES!!!!! [W25VvoWh5zY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Ending of the song 'Yume de Aetara'.
Instrumental transition and audience cheering while Omaru Poruka prepares for the next segment.
MC segment where Polka speaks to the crowd, thanking them and leading into the final song.
Omaru Polka performs 'Sekai wa Sore wo Ai to Yobunda ze' as the grand finale.
scenes.song_name: Sekai wa Sore wo Ai to Yobunda ze

subtitles.original: Baby!
subtitles.english: Baby!

subtitles.original: Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah!

subtitles.original: ここまで本当にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for everything up to now.

subtitles.original: えっと……
subtitles.english: Um...

subtitles.original: 十分伝えられたと思うけど、
subtitles.english: I think I've conveyed enough,

subtitles.original: でもまだ伝えきれてません。
subtitles.english: but I still haven't expressed it all yet.

subtitles.original: だからね、言いたいわけですよ僕は。
subtitles.english: So, I want to say this.

subtitles.original: 世界はそれを愛と呼ぶんだぜ！
subtitles.english: The world calls it love!

subtitles.original: 世界はそれを愛と呼ぶんだぜ
subtitles.english: The World Calls It Love

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲　山口隆
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: Takashi Yamaguchi

subtitles.original: 涙の中に微かな明かりが灯ったら
subtitles.english: When a faint light is lit within the tears

subtitles.original: 君の目の前で温めてたこと話すのさ
subtitles.english: I'll talk about the things I've been nurturing right before your eyes

subtitles.original: それでも僕らの声が乾いてゆくだけなら
subtitles.english: Even so, if our voices are just going to dry up

subtitles.original: 朝が来るまでせめて誰かと歌いたいんだ
subtitles.english: Then I want to sing with someone at least until morning comes

subtitles.original: 昨日のあなたが嘘だと言うなら
subtitles.english: If you say that who you were yesterday was a lie

subtitles.original: 昨日の景色を捨ててしまうだけだ
subtitles.english: Then I'll just throw away yesterday's scenery

subtitles.original: つなぐのは新しい君と僕なのさ
subtitles.english: What connects us is a new you and me

subtitles.original: 僕らなぜか確かめ合う
subtitles.english: For some reason, we confirm it with each other

subtitles.original: 世界じゃそれを愛と呼ぶんだぜ
subtitles.english: In this world, that's what they call love

subtitles.original: 心の声を つなぐのが
subtitles.english: Connecting the voices of our hearts

subtitles.original: これほど怖いものだとは
subtitles.english: I didn't know it was such a scary thing

subtitles.original: 君と僕が声を合わす
subtitles.english: You and I join our voices together

subtitles.original: 今までの過去なんてなかったかのように
subtitles.english: As if the past up until now never even existed

subtitles.original: 歌い出すんだ
subtitles.english: We start to sing

subtitles.original: 僕らはいつでも誰かを疑っちまうから
subtitles.english: Because we're always doubting someone

subtitles.original: せめて今だけ美しい歌を歌うのさ
subtitles.english: At least for now, let's sing a beautiful song

subtitles.original: 悲しい言葉では
subtitles.english: With sad words,

subtitles.original: 何も変わらないんだぜ
subtitles.english: nothing is going to change

subtitles.original: 奴らが何をしたって言うんだ
subtitles.english: What does it matter what they did?

subtitles.original: 昨日のあなたが裏切りの空なら
subtitles.english: If your yesterday was a sky of betrayal

subtitles.original: 昨日の景色を忘れてしまうだけだ
subtitles.english: Then I'll just forget yesterday's scenery

subtitles.original: 新しい日々を変えるのは
subtitles.english: What changes the new days

subtitles.original: いじらしいほどの愛なのさ
subtitles.english: is an almost heart-wrenching love

subtitles.original: 僕らそれを確かめ合う
subtitles.english: We confirm it with each other

subtitles.original: 世界じゃそれも愛と呼ぶんだぜ
subtitles.english: In this world, that too is what they call love

subtitles.original: 心の声を つなぐのが
subtitles.english: Connecting the voices of our hearts

subtitles.original: これほど怖いものだとは
subtitles.english: I didn't know it was such a scary thing

subtitles.original: 僕らなぜか声を合わす
subtitles.english: For some reason, we join our voices

subtitles.original: 今までの過去なんてなかったかのように
subtitles.english: As if the past up until now never even existed

subtitles.original: 歌い出すんだぜ
subtitles.english: We start to sing

subtitles.original: 僕らが！ 僕らが新しい日々を想う時に、
subtitles.english: When we! When we think of the new days,

subtitles.original: 僕らはどうしても愛という言葉を使ってしまうわけですよ！
subtitles.english: we inevitably end up using the word 'love'!

subtitles.original: 心の声と、あなたの憎しみと裏切りを、
subtitles.english: The voice of the heart, and your hatred and betrayal,

subtitles.original: 愛と言いたいわけですよ！
subtitles.english: I want to call it all love!

subtitles.original: 愛！ と！
subtitles.english: Love! And!

subtitles.original: 平！ 和！
subtitles.english: Peace!

subtitles.original: 愛！ と！ 平！ 和！
subtitles.english: Love! And! Peace!

subtitles.original: 悲しみで花が咲くものか！
subtitles.english: As if flowers could bloom from sadness!

subtitles.original: 新しい日々の僕たちは、
subtitles.english: We in our new days,

subtitles.original: 高鳴る予感がしてるのさ、君も！
subtitles.english: are having a throbbing premonition, you too!
